description: Ensure the posted request will not delete or modify an existing Custom Account Posting Rule Type.
When flagged true, the referenced Custom Account Posting Rule Type will be deleted.

Custom_Account_Posting_Rule_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Custom_Account_Posting_Rule_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Custom_Account_Posting_Rule_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to the Custom Account Posting Rule Type.

Custom_Account_Posting_Rule_Type_Data.description: A unique identifier for the Custom Account Posting Rule Type.
The name of the Custom Account Posting Rule Type.
The description of the Custom Account Posting Rule Type.

Account_Posting_Rule_Dimension__Mixed_Ob.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Custom_Account_Posting_Rule_Type_Data.description: Specifies the Account Posting Rule Dimensions for the Custom Account Posting Rule Type. These can either be Custom Account Posting Rule Dimensions or Workday delivered Account Posting Rule Dimensions.

description: Element containing all Custom Account Posting Rule Type data.
